data.eml:eml: A new Stenoloba Staudinger species from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Bryophilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pekarsky, Oleg (2011): A new Stenoloba Staudinger species from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Bryophilinae). ZooKeys 108: 67-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.108.1208, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.108.1208
